name: The Alpha Authority™
description:
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬[Description]▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
The dominating force upon an entire solar system, the Alpha Authority is a military empire in a world where science and technology have no limits. We are the the lone wolf, the symbol of our might as one people, one goal, and our conquest to conquer the entire Robloxian Universe. Our unity is marked by the friendships our people share with each other, and not the scars of our wars. It is our philosophy that it is fun that derives each soldiers true success in our clan. 
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬[Information]▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

shout.body: [TRAINING] Training in 20 minutes! Be at Bamboo Training Core 10 minutes before then! Permission To Speak and STS is in effect upon the start of the training, but you are free to talk beforehand.
